name: Classic Club Sandwich
author: Beth Pierce
description: This classic New York club sandwich recipe is layered with smoky ham, roasted turkey, smoked bacon, crisp lettuce, juicy tomatoes, cheddar cheese, and mayonnaise spread on every slice of this triple toasted bread extravaganza.  My family and I just love this tasty sandwich and I think I even have my picky son hooked on them.
ingredients: 8 ounces thin sliced deli turkey breast
4 slices leaf lettuce or iceberg lettuce
